attributes.action: ensure all electric vehicles are audable to pedestrians
attributes.additional_details: As I grow older I become more forgetful and sometimes careless when I cross aroad whilst in deep thought.
attributes.background: Pass a law  compelling  all electric vehicle manufacturers to make their vehicles audable to pedestrians

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582596

From 1 July 2019 all manufacturers have been required to install an acoustic sound system in new types of quiet electric and hybrid electric vehicles to improve road safety. You can read more about this requirement here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-noise-systems-to-stop-silent-electric-cars-and-improve-safety#:~:text=From%201%20July%202019%2C%20all,%2Fh%20(about%2012mph%20).
